ogTitle: 18.01.25 oprah not running for president - smarther news

card_1.cardText:
> “It’s not something that interests me.”
> 
> Oprah Winfrey on running for President InStyle Magazine, March Issue 2018

card_2.cardText:
Oprah: On Aging
===============

“You take no shit. None. Not a bit. In your 40s you want to say you take no shit, but you still do. In your 60s you take none.”

body:
The singular Oprah Winfrey on braving the elements, the way forward for women, and why, for now at least, she doesnat want to be president

byA LAURA BROWN

OW:A [Laughs] I actually saw a mug the other daya …a I thought it was a cute mug. All you need is a mug and some campaign literature and a T-shirt. Iave always felt very secure and confident with myself in knowing what I could do and what I could not. And so itas not something that interests me. I donat have the DNA for it. Gayleawho knows me as well as I know myself practicallyahas been calling me regularly and texting me things, like a woman in the airport saying, aWhenas Oprah going to run?a So Gayle sends me these things, and then sheall go, aI know, I know, I know! It wouldnat be good for youait would be good for everyone else.a I met with someone the other day who said that they would help me with a campaign. Thatas not for me.
